Paragraph.Text: COLATZ CITY-EXT. DAY

A giant space station (colatz city) colorfully neon, but infused with asteroids like Battlestar Galatica classic, flys through the outer realms. Little ships dock and launch at a consistent rate. A huge trail of garbage is left to drift in its wake.
TOURISTS SPACE SHIP - INT. DAY

NONDESCRIPT HUMAN DAD is driving agressively while NONDESCRIPT HUMAN MOM is examining pamplets. NONDESCRIPT HUMAN TEEN BOY is kicking the backseat with arms crossed bored AF, NONDESCRIPT HUMAN TEEN GIRL is staring wild eyed at colatz city as it comes into view
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN DAD
Who taught you how to fly?!! Stay on your own vector, moron!
KL'EO's SHIP approachs rapidly from behind
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN MOM

I don't understand why you get so worked up, we're on vacation. It's time to relax. (points at pamplet) Aren't you excited to see the Great Time Melt? Oh and the Calming Stones of Juloth N'or exhibit has been extended to next week!
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN TEEN BOY
What is the point of looking at a bunch of booring rocks?
KL'EO's SHIP is bumper to bumper with Tourist Space Ship, The ships lights Intensify like high beams, and a loud honking sound is heard from behind.
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN DAD
There's literraly an infinite amout of space around us! What's your GooBop Sungly Problem!
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN MOM
Just move over and let them pass!
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN DAD
I'm trying!
KL'EO's Ship rams into Tourist Space Ship. We see KL'EO has a wild malevolent look in her eyes as YAWG WHA freaks out in terror next to her through the driver's side window.
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN TEEN GIRL
Dad! You're being Reckless!
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN DAD
I Swear, Penelope, I will go back and strangle you if you don't shut up!
(his grip on the wheel is intense)
What's up with this jerk!

KL'Eo's Ship rams Tourist Space Ship once more and it veers off course, straight into the garbage trail left by Colatz City. They land on a big blobby piece of garbage and the ship stalls. KL'Eo and Yawg Wah give each other high fives as they begin to dock at Colatz city. Before they can dock, a giant blob of nano goo engulfs the ship and pulls it into a waiting security cruiser.
DISSOLVE TO:
COLATZ STONE MUSEUM- INT. DAY

We see An elaborate museum filled with famous stones throughout the universe. Moai Statues and olmec heads can be recognized along with weird alien stones. NONDESCRIPT HUMAN Mom is leading NONDESCRIPT HUMAN family into the museum. NONDESCRIPT HUMAN dad is in a foul mood and the children look bored.
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN MOM
It says here that the calming stones unique calming properties stem from their constant vibration at 1,319.46hz.
That's 420 x pi : not going to invest in a full sphere equation that would be crazy...
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN DAD
(under his breath) A bunch of Hippy rocks.
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN TEEN GIRL
Ohhh these are so pretty, Can I take one home, mom, please.
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN TEEN BOY
These rocks aren't for sale, stupid.
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN teen girl punches teen boy in the stomache, visibly winding him
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN TEEN GIRL
I was merely suggesting we liberate the pretty, shiny, precious from the bonds of captivity, Doofus!
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN DAD
(Groaning) Who is the literal idiot that decided to put the babble stone in a babbling brook filled with babblefish.
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN MOM
You could at least try to enjoy yourself, and (to teen girl) NO you may NOT liberate anything on this trip.
MUSEUM GUARD
We've got some potential pick pockets here, Shadowing the perps
(into walky talky)
Are you lost? I can show you to the exit.
An Alarm is heard and lights start flashing.
MUSEUM GUARD
I knew it. Apprehending the perps now!
Museum Guard pulls out a tazer which engulfs Sterotypical Mom, Teen Girl and Teen Boy. He pulls out a baton and goes clockwork orange on Sterotypical Dad.
CUT TO
QWETZ-OID is holding a calming stone attempting to run off with it but can't overcome the calm and he runs in slow motion. He is surrounded by museum guards who kick and beat him.
Suggested allusion to brotherhood of satan beating scene.
SQUALAZT FARMS EXT. DAY

Many Alienesque cows are grazing on a field of mantis-like living plants. The Squalazt are packed tightly behind an eerie and ominous barbed wire fence. A sign points to Slaughter Grounds. The disheveled NONDESCRIPT HUMAN TOURIST FAMILY looks exhausted. NONDESCRIPT HUMAN DAD is barely recognizable through a swollen face, NONDESCRIPT HUMAN MOM is visibly aged a generation. TEEN BOY is scratching at a visible scar inflicted by the tazer,so much so as to bleed. TEEN GIRL is in tears and is angry at the world.
TEEN BOY
This is the part in the movie where someone says "at least nothing can go wrong at a nice peaceful Squal---"

An undead squalatz, obviously having been through the slaughterhouse, bites on Teen Boy's throat as it threshes about erratically. SLAUGTERHOUSE Aliens (based on texas chainsaw massacre) surround the squallatz and subdue it by butchering it further
SLAUGHTERHOUSE ALIEN #1
I told you grampa was too old to do this job
SLAUGHTERHOUSE ALIEN #2
You respect your elders, you hear!
Slaughter House Alien #1 grabs Slaughterhouse Alien #2 by the ear in a fatherly way. He also grabs Leatherface alien by the ear.
SLAUGHTERHOUSE ALIEN #1
And you! You good for nothing nincompoop, I Told you to bar that door!
Leatherface Alien protests muffled and wildly.
SLAUGHTERHOUSE ALIEN #1
What did you say to me you hornswaggled soul tooth of a soft minded jackalope.
LEATHERFACE ALIEN
(pulling off mask)
I Said I need a normal mask, these stink!
LeatherFace alien grabs the Squallaszt and brandishes it in a way the texas chain saw massacre ended.

NONDESCRIPT HUMAN Mom is holding her son in mourning. NONDESCRIPT HUMAN dad starts yelling invectives at the Slaughterhouse Aliens. NONDESCRIPT HUMAN Teen Girl has a mix of horror and Shaudenfreuda at her brother's misfortune. In the background we see BIO-NET skulking away from the slaughter house grounds.
CAR'OLAN MEMORIAL FAIRGROUNDS INT. DAY

NONDESCRIPT HUMAN DAD is stridently leading his family through the fairgrounds at an anxious urgent pace. NONDESCRIPT HUMAN MOM is hovering over TEEN SON with concern. TEEN GIRL dawdles at the sights. Teen Son is a deathly palor, and shambles like a zombie. His scar is now gaping and infected, his throat is in stitches. A nanobot goo emits from his eyes.
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN DAD
Don't worry son! I promised you the Y'llaw d'rlow Ride and By Glustrop's grace, we are almost there!
Teen Boy examines his scar, shoves it in his mouth and chews a big chunk of flesh out, blood and nanbot goo expell from the wound and dribble down his cheeks. NONDESCRIPT HUMAN Mom trys to stop him.
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN TEEN GIRL
Let him do it mom! At least he's eating.
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN MOM
Penelope, you are getting on my last nerve.
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN TEEN GIRL
Fine, I'll just go have fun by myself.
Penelope runs off.
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN DAD
You are in big trouble if you don't come back here! (in a serious concerned tone) She's been so much trouble ever since her fronds started sprouting.
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN MOM
I'd like to tell you that it's a vulnerable time in a woman's life, but she's a psychopath! She doesn't care at all about what's happened to her brother! What's wrong with her!
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN DAD
Ah yes, a vulnerable time indeed.
Teen Boy rolls his eyes. They approach a closed rollercoaster type ride.
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN DAD
We are going on that ride or my name isn't
A large piece of the ride descends from above and squashes Sterotypical Dad into a bloody pulp. NONDESCRIPT HUMAN Mom stares at her husband, looks at her son, and turns her head to hear
NONDESCRIPT HUMAN TEEN GIRL
(offscreen)
You skimped on my cotton candy, I ought to pull out your intestines and use them to braid my hair!!!!
Another piece of the ride falling off is telagraphed by a shadow forming a tiny way off from Sterotypical Mom. She calmly and deliberetly steps into the shadow and Squished into paste as well.
Teen Boy starts licking the exposed alien innards.

The camera pans up to reveal LU-CIAN and ARSONBOT 2525. Arsonbot is lighting Lucian's Gaseous expulsions that constantly emenate from a tube in his head. The blasts engulf and weakens parts of the ride. This Causes pieces to fall below, a fact which elicits laughter and yoddling. They are drinking cans of a bright neon drinks and obviously drunk.
A gang of Warriors type aliens(the Rogues)on hoverskates like in jet set radio future climb around them and start tagging them with spray paint.
LUTHER
You've got a bounty on your head so I've come to playyyyeeeee.
Security drones arrive on the scene and machine gun half the group. Luther is among those shot
HEAD SECURITY BOT

Thank you citizen! Your tip has led to the location of the sons of an important head of state. Without your service, their diplomatic immunity would surely have led to the demise of Colazt city. 250 terrabytes have been added to your cryptomining capacity. Have a pleaseant day.
ARSONBOT 2525
Ah c'mon. I was just trying to have some fun. Dad blow's these things out of proportion.
LU'CIEN
Can I shoot the rest?
HEAD SECURITY BOT
Well I can't see the harm.
ARSONBOT 2525
You shot them last time! I don't know why dad favors you, You are obviously the adopted one.
LU'CIEN
Poor deluded Arsonbot 2525. What has the Squaz Milk done to you? I don't get away with shit.
Lu'cien shoots the rest with a machine gun, and then points at ARSONBOT 2525. And he Lets loose a little spray of bullets near his feat.
ARSONBOT 2525
Quit it!
LU'CIEN
Quit it! (mockingly)
HEAD SECURITY BOT
Allright you two, your father's waiting.
COLLAZT CITY JUVENILE DETENTION CENTER INT. DAY
WARDEN'S OFFICE INT. DAY

COLAZT AMBASSEDOR HLLLLLLLLGRRRRR is sitting calmly. WARDEN JUDGE WARDEN is behind his desk, flipping through a juvenile's file and INTERIOR MINISTER OF COLLAZT AFFAIRS HAWNK is wringing her tentacles and pacing with anxiety
INTERIOR MINISTER OF COLLAZT AFFAIRS HAWNK
An Entire vacation ruined by the children of Collazt city. This could ruin our tourism industry!
COLAZT AMBASSEDOR HLLLLLLLLGRRRRR
I know, but what can be done. Boys will be boys! Let's call it finished, eh?
WARDEN JUDGE WARDEN
Now now. We have the experts coming in, They'll figure it all out for us.
The Warden's office door opens and GOLLY GEE GUARD appears in the doorway.
GOLLY GEE GUARD
The Ineffable Deb is here sir!
WARDEN JUDGE WARDEN
Um, you realize we have an entire phone network setup so you don't have to walk down to my office every time don't you?
GOLLY GEE GUARD
Yes Sir. Um, sorry sir.
Golly Gee Guard quickly shuts the door.
WARDEN JUDGE WARDEN
Well, it's about time you met the latest in bio-ai quantum jingolowatts er ah technology.
Warden Judge Warden gets up to leave and begins ushering the officials out the door. The phone rings.
WARDEN JUDGE WARDEN
What now?
COLAZT AMBASSEDOR HLLLLLLLLGRRRRR
I hope it's Hildy's kid this time, she's so high and mighty it'd be good to knock her down a peg
Warden Judge Warden picks up the phone
GOLLY GEE GUARD
(offcamera)
Um, the Ineffable Deb is, uh here.
Visibly annoyed, Warden Judge Warden hangs up forcefully.
COLAZT AMBASSEDOR HLLLLLLLLGRRRRR
Was it Hildy's kid?
CUT TO
JUVENILE HOLDING AND RECIEVING INT. DAY
All manner of young aliens and biobots are standing in a queue with various expressions of fear and defience.
THE INEFFABLE DEB is standing next to GOLLY GEE GUARD
WARDEN GUARD WARDEN approaches Deb with AMBASSADOR HLLLGRRRRR and INTERIOR MINISTER HAWNK follow behind.
WARDEN JUDGE WARDEN
Ah, here's The Deb. Beautiful aren't they?
HAWNK
What's this? This thing is ancient. Where's the biomass? What's your game Warden?
WARDEN JUDGE WARDEN
(slapping Deb on it's shell) You have no idea.
THE INEFFABLE DEB
Our bio-mass is contained in our shell, in addition, our critical decision matrix processing consists of millions of tiny organic sentients.
GOLLY GEE GUARD
So your brain is filled with little people? Golly Gee.
THE INEFFABLE DEB
Each of our hemispheres consist of entire self contained civilizations.
LEFT BRAIN CIVILIZATION - INT. DAY

A bustling city, active with aliens engaged in rhetorical debates. A group of toga wearing aliens are in deep discussion. A street sweeper passes by and throws her 2 cents in, a fact which disturbs the toga wearers and quickly leave her prsesne
THE INEFFABLE DEB (CONT.)
We arrive at the perfect solution to any problem through dialectic processing and ambiguity gates.
RIGHT BRAIN CIVILIZATION INT. DAY

A civilization a bit more disheveled and chaotic is bustling with activity. Two Toga'd aliens are deep in philosophical debate. A street cleaner puts her two cents in and is given a hug and invited to join them. The streets are filled with garbage as most of the essential workers are involved in vigorous discussion.
THE INEFFABLE DEB (CONT.)
Our civilizations are designed to create diametrically opposed values to eek out the widest variety of veiwpoints. This ensures the decision matrix isn't working with an incomplete dataset.
COLAZT AMBASSEDOR HLLLLLLLLGRRRRR
(offscreen)
A list of answers isn't a solution. How do you know which is right?
INEFFABLE DEB'S PROVING GROUNDS INT. NIGHT

A siren is heard and the question "how do you know which is right?" appears in the sky. Armies from each civilization line up and then battle until only one remains. SURVIVING BATTLE PARTICIPENT pulls out a megaphone and points it to the sky
SURVIVING BATTLE PARTICIPENT
That is a complex algorythm surely..
JUVENILE HOLDING AND RECIEVING INT. DAY
THE INEFFABLE DEB
...beyond the capacity for you to comprehend.
WARDEN JUDGE WARDEN
I'm telling you, they are infallable.
COLAZT AMBASSEDOR HLLLLLLLLGRRRRR
I don't like mystery box technology.
HAWNK
If it fixes this public relations nightmare, I'd listen to a dead mouse.
DISSOLVE TO:
JUVENILE DENTENTION CELL INT. DAY
A confined classroom detention area, reminescent of On Campus Suspension, contains THE REFORMSCHOOL ETS modeled after kids poses in class of 1984 and class of nuke em high.
AMBASSADOR HLLLLGRRRRR is smiling good naturedly at the antics of LU'CIEN, as he puches ARSONBOT 2525
COLAZT AMBASSEDOR HLLLLLLLLGRRRRR
You gonna let him get away with that? Puch him back you wuss.
LU'CIEN
(looking sheepish)
Daaad. Hes nothing but metal and fire.
COLAZT AMBASSEDOR HLLLLLLLLGRRRRR
Didn't stop you from hitting him, did it? Now puch him Asonbot 2525, cmon punch him in the golatz stomache!
ARSONBOT 2525
I don't want to hurt..
Arsonbot2525 is winded as Lu'Cien punches him in the stomache.
LU'CIEN
Take that you weak peice of shit
COLAZT AMBASSEDOR HLLLLLLLLGRRRRR
Ha ha ha. Well at least one of my boys learned the lesson. Take the shot when you can! Ha ha ha.
PENELOPE
That's some completely fucked up shit you're feeding your kids.
LU'CIEN
Look who just decided to make herself target practice.
COLAZT AMBASSEDOR HLLLLLLLLGRRRRR
Now son, remember our discussion about plausible deniability.(agressively) Shes off limits! Now, and...forever.
PENELOPE
Let him lose, I'm not taking anyone's crap anymore!
ARSONBOT 2525
(concerned)I don't think you know what you're asking for.
Lu'Cien stares contemptuously at penelope, sticking his tougues out at her vulgarly.
Penelope attempts one back but is not very succsessful, it ends up more sensual than agressive.
Lu'Cien looks confused, and his face twists into sadistic contempt mixed with lust.
Penelope's face instantly turns to horrified disgust and then Anger.
PENELOPE
I said I'm NOT TAKING ANYONES CRAP ANYMORRRRRRE!
The entire room stops bustling with activity and all faces stare at Penelope.
PENELOPE
Don't you dare
YAWG WU
Ha, She's on her Perio..
Penelope lunges at Yawg Wu's throat and squeezes with a stregth not betrayed by her slender tentacle arms
Golly Gee Guard, Warden Judge Warden, and Interior Minister Hawnk pull her off and return the room to order.
INTERIOR MINISTER HAWNK
(whispered to Ambassador Hllllllgrrrrr)
I don't feel bad about sending her with this crew anymore.
COLAZT AMBASSEDOR HLLLLLLLLGRRRRR
Crazy fucking broad, what do you expect, they're all crazy.
WARDEN JUDGE WARDEN

Allright you chuckle heads and fallopinooks Life Is about to change drastically for you. You're the lowest of the low, the truest scum I've ever met and If I was given my druthers you'd all be sunk in a cell 50 feet deep into the garbage flow. You've cost Colazt city more in destruction and potential tourism revenue, It would take you 50 millenia in the cryptomines just to cover the interest. But Interior Minister Of Colazt Affairs Hawk and Ambassador Hrrrgrrrrrr here have softened my heart, so instead, you are all getting a free camping vacation. I mean really Ineffable Deb, seriosly. Ok. Ok . The Ineffable Deb has graciously Offered to be your camp warden.
The camera pans around the room and focuses on each reform school et as the warden speaks
WARDEN JUDGE WARDEN (CONT'D)

You will be sent to a remote planet inhabitted with no sentient life in the deepestest recessess of known space. There you will have to depend on each other to survive, you'll face the ravages of an unforgiving environment and you will emerge as a cohesive unit, ready to kill for each other, almost certainly dead set on revenge angainst the people you feel unjustly sent you there. Only then, Only then will you
GOLLY GEE GUARD
Why are the tourist victim's kid's here sir.
WARDEN JUDGE WARDEN
We need to keep them quiet, you know, just long enough until I retire. If you keep quiet, you may very well retire one day too.
GOLLY GEE GUARD
Well that makes sense, but why is that kid here?
Cut to Med-I-Kate looking into a compact with a sad dejected look on her face.
WARDEN JUDGE WARDEN
Because he pushes everyone on my buttons the wrong way, do you know he actually thinks he's a girl? This camp will straighten him out.
GOLLY GEE GUARD
She looks like a girl to me.
WARDEN JUDGE WARDEN
Do you want to join them?
GOLLY GEE GUARD
Oh golly gee no. Sorry sir.
The camera pulls out slowly as the children protest wildly. The Camera pulls out a window out of Collazt City and smears to
SECURITY SCHOOL BUS SHIP - EXT DAY
A JEEPER's CREEPERs, dressed in a cheerleader's outfit jumps onto the bus and it starts to rip a hole through the roof
JEEPERS CREEPERS
That dress looks my size! I must possess it!
SECURITY SCHOOL BUS SHIP - INT. DAY
The Jeeper Creepers is clawing through the open roof at PENELOPE. MEDI-KATE is sitting in the back gazing at a mirror
Penelope pulls back and almost trips forward from LU'CIEN's manspread legs.
Penelope Gets angry, grabs the jeepers creeper's caught off guard hands, and throws her toward the safety exit in the back being sure to hit LU'CIEN's legs in the process.
PENELOPE
Medi-kate!
Medi-kate looks up, calmly opens the back exit, and she resumes looking into her mirror
MEDI-KATE
I'm a victim of my own male gaze.
Jeepers Creepers strugles to hold on to the bus like in Alien.
Medi-Kate calmly closes the exit
MEDI-KATE
Ok. Bye, love you or whatever.But you know penelope, she's right about that dress. Smokin.
PENELOPE
awe, Thank you! I love your necklace
Penelope and Medi-kate sit down next to each other and start talking.
THE INEFFABLE DEB

I Would ask each of you to reflect on the impact your actions as a series of infinite fractures in the sheet of one quantum chronal thread.try to imply vectored movement with frictionless velocity in multiphasal-dimensional space.explore velocity without time and be sure to log your work.
The camera pulls out slowly as The Deb blathers on about lorenz patterns, fibonacci series and ecto plasmic resonant hallucinators.

THE CAMERA ZOOMS out to reveal the jeepers creepers hanging on desperately to a neon sign debri stuck to the bus with other space junk. The words read "the end?" with a question mark that flashes in a timing that suggests classic sequal baiting in movies, like contamination
I want a goblin soundtrack here. Conexxion.
The camera zooms out further and smears to
EARTH BASE CAMP. EXT DAY.

The INEFFABLE DEB is instructing the kids in the art of making a pyramid base camp. The terrain is Jurrasic Jungle Like. Unknown dinosaur species variously enter and exit the scene frolicing and dining on each other.
QUEZT-OID is grabbing every plant he can, tasting it for its effects. KLE'O and Yahg Wa are following closely, yahg Wa is happily carrying three huge stones.
K'LEO
Any luck yet Quetz? I'm feeling a bit dulled.
QUEZT-OID
This stuff is so primative. I'm working with nothing but rhizomes and sporangia.
K'LEO
Keep trying, huh?
The Ineffable Deb indicates K'leo, Quezt-oid and Yahg Wa
THE INEFFABLE DEB

Watch children. A perfect triad of team work, each fulfilling a role the other lacks. Yah Wa provides copius strength to lift each member's stone carrying quota, Quezt-oid is using their experience with narcotics to identify medicine for the group.
LU'CIEN
(offscreen)
What the blatz is ballbuster here doing?
K'LEO
I am keeping my murderous pyschopathic urges at bay, fuckwit.(she looks hurt) It's a real problem for me.
LU'CIEN is sitting on a stone that is being pulled by ARSONBOT 2525, occasionally kicking him in the head.
THE IEFFABLE DEB
Where is your other stone Lu'cien?
LU'CIEN
This is my stone, Arsonbot's going back for his.
ARSONBOT 2525 looks angry for a moment, kicks the stone and sighs dejectedly and turns back to get his stone
PENELOPE and her brother are struggling with stones larger than average, while MEDI-KATE appears to carry none.
MEDI-KATE
What's your brother's name any way?
She looks at her brother reflectively as drool dribbles down his mouth and nano bot goo bleeds from his eyes
PENELOPE
He's not my brother anymore. Just call him Doofus.
DISSOLVE TO:
EARTH BASE CAMP. EXT NIGHT.
THE CHILDREN are surrounding a fire, tired and scheming exits. The Ineffable Deb begins to stumble.
PENELOPE
Are you allright miss deb?
THE INEFFABLE DEB

We prevail, Death to the fasciauthoritarian AI Hive. Long live freedom! Whooo! First stop Gamblopolis. No! On other thought we should take care of these creatures in my charge. Gun holder says nah. I'm serious, somone is literally holding a gun to my head as we speak. Ok. Later kids. This is why they call it survival wilderness camp. Good luck!

The Ieffeable Deb is running around as if on coke, because there is no seperation between thought, deliberation and action. It Stumbles into the space ship as the kids try to chase behind, but they are too late and the ship flys erratically into space, narrowly missing an allosaurous in it's path.
K'LEO
I knew it! You can't ever trust a machine! First there was the robohog shooting. Then the borderbot uprising on fasci-fetish prime.
QUEZT-OID

I'm not really into this line of reasoning K'leo. It feels destined to fall down a dark hole. You're forgetting that robohog was the first bio-robot synthetic, it was more a failure on the biological end if you ask me.
K'LEO
Are you saying robots are superior?
QUEZT-OID
Dude, no. This is a complicated topic to talk about in a nuanced way with so many emotions and so much history wrapped up in it. I'm just asking you approach from a starting stance of acceptance.
YAWG WU
So do I need to get more stones... Or. I'm just going to go get some more stones.
PENELOPE
So what? are we just fucked? Why are you two so calm.
LU'CIEN
Arsonbot 2525, someone finally called you calm.
Arsonbot 2525 is pacing back and forth nervously
PENELOPE
Ok. We'll your both still acting pretty suspicious to me.
LU'CIEN

Is baby Karen going to tell on me? Who you going to tell? your freak friend over there? Oh wait don't tell your zombie fuck brother, I mean he's a man, he might be able to do something. Go fall into a pit of despair.
PENELOPE
If you think I'm going to you get away with attacking the only family I've got right now...

Doofus makes a loud crunching sound, he starts devouring his arm, which he has managed to chew completely detached from his body. His head is back as if sword swallowing. He continues to suck and dribble on his arm, head tilted back, until Medi-kate can wrangle it out of his throat. She flys back into a stegosaurus, knocks her head into its shell like scales and passes out, penelope checks on kate, pulls the arm out of kates hand
PENELOPE
Yeah, go ahead, knock yourself out.
She shoves the arm back into Doofus's mouth
PENELOPE
AT LEAST he's eating. (through gritted teeth)
K'LEO
Damn bitch. You are the craziest of the lot of us. We should do brunch.
QUEZT-OID
I'd really like to get back to my experiments...
K'LEO
Yeah im over it. Bye bababa bye bye.
K'leo, and Qwetz-oid head back toward the quarry.
PENELOPE
I've got to believe things will get better.
LU'CIEN
Golatz is a sadistic child who only cares how much pain you can spread throughout universe.
PENELOPE

I'm familiar with the teachings, quit trying to convert me. Everyone seems to think I've never heard the word of Golazt. But let me tell you something, The mythical creature called this person who has "never heard of Golazt" does not exist. I have heard nothing but Golazt this and Golazt that since I was old enough to process sound!
Med-I-kate stirs from her concussion.
MED-I-KATE
Whoa, Someone was triggered.
DISSOLVE TO:
SECRET MEETING PLACE EXT. NIGHT
LU'CIEN is leaning against a herculoids type triceretops and ARSONBOT 2525 is pacing nervously back and forth occasionally setting foilage on fire.
ARSONBOT 2525
When will he get here?
LU'CIEN
Chill, I set the beacon only half a chronon ago.
ARSONBOT 2525
Yeah, but what if he leaves us here. Its unbearably booring. Sure there's lots of stuff to set on fire.
Arsonbot sets a tree on fire and causes a swarm of pteradactlys to fly in a panicked frenzy.
ARSONBOT 2525
But where's the chaos?
LU'CIEN
You're not looking hard enough, we can torture those other rejects for a good while before it gets booring.
Ambassador Hllllgrrrrr's ship appears and lands in a clearing, Lu'ien and Arsonbot run up to the ship and the door opens to reveal AMBASSADOR HLLLLGRRRR
AMBASSADOR HLLLGRRRRR
Well boys, did you have a good time? Got your fill?
ARSONBOT 2525
I'm ready to blow this popsicle stand.
Arsonbot holds himself for warmth and shakes with chills as a volcano errupts in the distance.
LU'CIEN
I took care of the Inneffable Deb, just like you asked me to.
AMBASSADOR HLLLLGRRRRR
Great work son! I'm proud of you. you really are growing so much!
Ambassador Hllllgrrr is patting his son on the back as he surveys his surroundings.
AMBASSADOR HLLLLGRRRR
So where is it?
LU'CIEN
Where is what dad?
AMBASSADOR HLLLLGRRRRR
Where's your mother's smelly ass? what do yopu think I mean, the deb,I thaught you said you took care of it. So where is it?
ARSONBOT 2525
I didn't touch it dad
AMBASSADOR HLLLLGRRRRR
This isn't time to kiss up, arsonbot 2525, stay out of it. Now LU'CIEN, if you tell me you don't know where The Deb is, we are going to have a problem.
Ambassador Hlllllgrrrr is punching and slapping his kid in the face.
LU'CIEN
I don't understand. You said take him out! I took him out out!(crying in pain)
AMBASSADOR HLLLLGRRRRR
Then WHERE IS IT! That machine's got millions of tiny witnesses we have to wipe out it's brain!
ARSONBOT 2525
It said something about Gambopolis.
AMBASSADOR HLLLLGRRRRR
You mean to tell me that thing is roaming off PLANET. You said you took care of it! Oh you fucking idiot. Why did you lie to me son? Don't you know by now I'm going to beat you either way.
LU'CIEN
But I did take care of it. I gave one of the civilizations a laser pistol.
AMBASSADOR HLLLLGRRRRR
I didn't ask you for creativity, I asked you for results
Ambassador Hlllllgrrrrrr kicks Lu'cien to the ground and Lu'cien spits up blood.
AMBASSADOR HLLLLGRRRRR

Don't touch anyone until I say so, get it? Maybe I can salvage this, but it looks like its not gonna be the weekend retreat you thought it would be. Sorry kids, its out of my hands now. Hope you like earth cuisine. Heh.
Ambassador Hllllgrrrr Slams his spaceship door and flys away.
ARSONBOT 2525
I don't think he's coming back for a while.
LU'CIEN
I hope he never comes back!
Ambassador Hllllgrrrr's ship lands back at the site
AMBASSADOR HLLLLGRRRRR
And make sure that Penelope kid stays alive, or I'll be forced to bury you and play victem with the other parents. Tears strain my eyes, got it!
Ambassador Hlllgrrr's ship flys off again in a rush.
LU'CIEN

Well that's going to spoil my fun. Wait, aren't their intelligent species allready here, that LizardMan gave us a 50 minute dissertation about how glorious the smokey abyss is. Its a 15 foot pool filled with dry ice for golsac's sake.
ARSONBOT 2525
It's unfortunate The only quote unquote sentient species on this planet are obsessed with smoke and dry ice.
LU'CIEN
Zealots are boring cause they seem to enjoy the torture. I mean it would be different if they were obssessed with me.
ARSONBOT 2525
We could make our own toys, help one of these more tolerable creatures out on the sentience scale a bit.
LU'CIEN
These big animals are a bit much, though, don't you think?
ARSONBOT 2525
Oh, that one's cute.
A tritylontid scurries about. Lu'Cien picks one up and it nuzzles his face. He is suprisingly gentle with the creature.
LU'CIEN
You're right, this is about as meeke a base as you're about to find. They'll evolve to be highly persuadeable.
ARSONBOT 2525
If we get them smart enough...
LU'CIEN
They'll build us a way out of here and we won't have to lift a finger. You Know, Arsonbot 2525. Maybe sometimes you aren't so dumb. Yeah, you're safe, for now. Just don't cross me.
ARSONBOT 2525
Do you have to give me that same speech every week?
LU'CIEN
Just giving you a progress report.
Lu'cien then punches arsonbot 2525 in the stomache.
Camera reveals Penelope witnessing the scene from behind two giant ferns
PENELOPE
We are fuc...
Cue vacation type theme and credits
